title: Dr Frankenstein's Gift to Womankind
description: What happens when every mother's nightmare becomes every woman's dream?Kaspar has a face even his mother couldn't love. Alone in the world and forced to live a twilight existence, he decides to end it all. By a strange twist of fate, his attempted suicide drops him quite literally at the feet of Dr Friedrich Hoffman, a disgraced plastic surgeon...
author: Patrick Whittaker
